original_text: “My manner of life from my youth, spent from the beginning among my own nation and in Jerusalem, is known by all the Jews.
korean_text: 내가 처음부터 내 민족과 더불어 예루살렘에서 젊었을 때 생활한 상황을 유대인이 다 아는 바라

sentences.original_text: My manner of life from my youth
spent from the beginning among my own nation
sentences.korean_translation: 처음부터 내 동족 가운데서 보낸 것인데

sentences.original_text: is known by all the Jews.
